execution_quality: The agent successfully located relevant code files and made targeted edits to implement the requested feature, but the implementation had functional issues that only became apparent during user testing.
work_category: Feature implementation to add Super key as push-to-talk option with voice activity detection and minimum length filtering for a voice interaction system.
summary: The agent implemented the Super key push-to-talk feature with appropriate focus and autonomy, successfully modifying the necessary configuration files. However, the implementation had two critical functional bugs (weakened wakeword detection and broken re-listening behavior) that were only discovered during user testing, indicating insufficient validation before completion and requiring significant follow-up iteration to fix.
follow_up_pattern: User reported two specific bugs: (1) wakeword detection is weaker in always-on mode compared to test mode, (2) the system sends messages without re-listening afterwards. These indicate the feature was partially broken, leading to troubleshooting.
